abstract: Shu-Aib Walters (born 26 December 1981 in Cape Town, Western Cape) is a South African soccer player who plays as a goalkeeper for Maritzburg United in the Premier Soccer League.
comment: Shu-Aib Walters (born 26 December 1981 in Cape Town, Western Cape) is a South African soccer player who plays as a goalkeeper for Maritzburg United in the Premier Soccer League.
